pages.text: Blowguns are a new type of weapon, made especially useful in the dangerous jungle.$(br)You can use the blowgun to fire darts at enemies, inflicting unique effects.$(br)Normal darts do not have any effect, and must be altered to have any power.
A simple common poisonous dart, helpful to do a little damage to enemy humans, but won't effect zombies.
A spectral dart, it will give any enemy it hits glowing allowing for easier tracking of their movements.
A dart of shadow form, it causes enemies to be harder to tell apart, but weakens their melee power strongly.
A dart of levitation, it will cause your enemy to float into the air and lose a lot of their manoeuvrability.
A dart of blindness, will cause enemies to go temporarily blind but will have a reduced effect on zombies with their strong sense of smell.
A dart of stone skin, it will cause an enemy to lose a majority of their movement ability from their stiff body, but will also make them much more resilient to attacks.
A heated dart, these can be made by using a dart on a cauldron filled with lava, and will pack a strong fiery punch to any enemy they hit.
